All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Alphabet
This class is created to redefine the order of letters Latin letters are easy to compare, because their key codes have the same order as in the alphabet But some of cyrillic letters have key code order different from order in the alphabet
DataInput
This class is for reading and checking input data from the console
DynamicArray
This class is intended to make the work with arrays easier Allows creating dynamic arrays, which contain objects of different types
Faculty
The class of the faculty
Helper
This class is responsible for processing the user's input data and also for interacting with the user.
Main
 
Sortable
This is the interface, which is intended for providing additional methods for different objects, that are supposed to be sortable
Sortable.SortingType
The type of sorting.
Specialty
The class of the specialty
StringHandler
This class contains some additional methods for comfortable work with values of String type

The class of the student

This is the class of teacher
